detaileddescription.para: Provides a landing page for administrating custom tables.
A template function which returns markup to display details for the custom table

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the custom table

detaileddescription.para: Just a simple form for confirming deletion of a custom table
form submit hook for the tripal_custom_tables_delete_form form.
A Form to Create/Edit a Custom table.

parameterdescription.para: The current state of the form (Form API)
The unique ID of the Custom table to Edit or NULL if creating a new table

detaileddescription.para: Submit the Create/Edit Custom table form Implements hook_form_submit().
Implements hook_validate(). Validate the Create/Edit custom table form.
Contains functions for creating, editing and deleting custom tables on the Tripal website.
